name: Cameroon_Patient
description: Form to fill for each patient

views.htmlContent: <script>function generateId() {var d = new Date();var date = "0" + d.getDate();date = date.substr(date.length - 2);var month = "0" + (d.getMonth() + 1);month = month.substr(month.length - 2);var year = "" + d.getFullYear();year = year.substr(year.length - 2);var surveyorId = ObsService.getObs("num_enq");var numberOfIdDigits = 5;var idIterator = window.localStorage.getItem("idIterator");if (!idIterator) {idIterator = 1;}var formattedIdIterator = idIterator + "";while (formattedIdIterator.length < numberOfIdDigits) {formattedIdIterator = "0" + formattedIdIterator }var idCompiled = year + month + date + "-" + surveyorId + "-" + formattedIdIterator;return idCompiled;}FormApp.on("initializeObs",function(){var surveyor = window.localStorage.getItem("surveyor");if(surveyor){ObsService.setObs("num_enq", surveyor)} if(!ObsService.getObs("id_num")){var idIterator = window.localStorage.getItem("idIterator"); if(!idIterator) {idIterator = 0} window.localStorage.setItem("idIterator", parseInt(idIterator) + 1);var idCompiled = generateId();ObsService.setObs("id_num", idCompiled);}}); obsList.on("changeObsValue:num_enq", function(model, value, options) {var idCompiled = generateId();ObsService.setObs("id_num", idCompiled);});</script>
